Title: Darkness Falls
Writer: Bryan Konietzko (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino (creator), Joshua Hamilton
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: Korra discovers a new twist in Unalaq's evil plan. Meanwhile, Tenzin realizes he must face his own demons in order to save his daughter.
